Html:
Hi all,

i'm working with phpexcel 1.7.6

After create and download an excel file with PHPExcel (Excel5) if i try to copy cell to other book on excel, the background is changed to rgb colors.

So, if i defined the background color on php excel as

    'fill' => array(
        'type' => PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_SOLID,
        'startcolor' =>  array(
            'argb' => '0099CCFF',
        ),
     ),

when i copy that cell to other book, the color background i get is red

Can anybody help me?

Thanks in Advance
Can you try with version 1.7.7 - there were a number of fixes to colour handling included in that release
